website_summaries.verdict: This “green” powder detergent is reliable for cleaning the clothing and linens of kids and adults alike without any harmful chemicals present.
pros: This is another “green” detergent, making it a solid choice for those with skin sensitivities, such as eczema
Non-toxic formula makes it safe to use on the clothes and linens of little ones
Does a particularly good job cleaning whites
cons: Is not the best at getting out deep stains

website_summaries.verdict: Molly's Suds is a powder detergent that does not have any unnatural chemicals at all.
pros: Seems to work well for eczema sufferers
Made with 5 ingredients including peppermint essential oil
Can also be used in a paste as a pre-treatment on stains
cons: Since this is a powder form, it cannot be used in a high-efficiency washer soap dispenser

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well and non toxic
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I haven't used conventional detergent in a while so it's hard to compare the two. But, i love feeling confident that I'm not putting toxic chemicals near me or my children. Also, if you make a concentrated solution with a little water it takes off stains pretty well. I also used it to clean my daughter's dirty car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia P.

customer_reviews.title: and it was fine for not-too-soiled items
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while, and it was fine for not-too-soiled items, but it is definitely not cleaning my deodorant off my shirts or the mud/dirt off my husbands' pants (that's with me pre washing/soaking them before putting them in). I've also thought about using washing soda/baking soda without paying the high price for a ready made product. I will say though, this stuff lasts forever, so if you just need a mild clean, this will do the trick. Leaves no scent, and will cake up if you put it in the top of the washer, so put it in the bottom then the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Iceberg 67

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for about 6 months and finally gave up on it. It left white streaks on my dark clothes requiring an extra rinse and that didn't always get them out. I tried making sure it dissolved before adding clothes to the wash water, different temperatures of water, nothing seemed to help. It was kind of stuck in my washer so that after I switched back to a regular detergent, there were still some white streaks. Took about 4 loads to clean the washer. I like the idea of a natural, simple product but also want good results. We have hard water so that probably affected the success of the powder. Sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Julie n>

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Molly Suds does not do what it says it will. I used 4 tablespoons of detergent for a cloth diaper load (more than recommended) and the diapers came out smelling of urine and had poo on them still. I even rinse the diapers before I wash. It does not work for my other clothes either. I got chocolate on my shirt and pre rinsed before washing with MS. As you can see in the picture the stain was not lifted. Love the idea but this product needs improved.
customer_reviews.author: Jen W.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product, just to be more environmentally friendly. We don't suffer from allergies or sensitivities in my household. I've done about 10 loads so far--darks, colors, whites, towels, etc. Just one small scoop (provided in the bag) is all I've used. (I have a new toploading washing machine, and live in the south, and have well water, so our water is never really "cold" compared to other climates.) There is really no scent left behind. Everything came out clean in appearance and smell, even sweaty exercise clothes! I plan to continue buying this!
customer_reviews.author: asboyer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful this would be a great alternative then the typical laundry soap. I used it to wash a few loads of my husbands work clothes and ended up having to rewash them with oxi-clean. :( They did not get ANY dirt out, and even some clothes didn't even smell clean and still had the working man smell. I was incredibly disappointed and surprised it didn't work at all. Since the load was so soiled, I used 3 scoops.... a complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my commercial detergent. It works very well on regular clothes and linens. It does not work well on stinky gym clothes. I even tried complimenting it with vinegar in my wash and that helped some but I would not be through an entire workout when I could smell my stinky clothes. It does work well on everything else. If they could come up with a stinky gym clothes formula I would give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Ditch liquid detergents, buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Molly’s Suds!! We do laundry for 2 adults and this bag lasts several months.. like six plus months. A nice peppermint smells that is NOT noticeable in the clothes after washing. We have never had any issues with this product. This has great ingredients, scores well for any health or environmental hazards.. Unlike the liquid detergents or pods you buy in the store- scary. Definitely a great option for a good price if you care about the ingredients you soak all your clothing and linen in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying a laundry powder. I have tried making my own detergent and boosters, I've used every name brand, plant based, eco friendly liquid there is and pre treating products without finding what works best for my family. THIS powder detergent is better than them all. It isn't overly fragrant and it does not add a scent to the laundry, you only have to use a tablespoon per load (120 loads for $20!) and it works well on all types of stains. Awesome stuff, thanks Molly Suds!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte windsor-nash

customer_reviews.title: Really great alternative for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been really impressed with this detergent. I wish I would have switched to a more natural detergent earlier. This stuff smells great and seems to get clothing clean. I have not yet had to try to get any serious stains out, but it has worked great for regular clothing and linens. I also love that the ingredients are simple. It is hard to learn what causes a problem for kids with sensitive skin, so reducing the number of ingredients is helpful. I have been using it daily and it stretches pretty far. For the price, I think it's actually cheaper than the crappy, big brand stuff.
customer_reviews.author: SomeoneLovesBooks

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent for our sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: A coworker recommended me to this company after I shared that my baby and I have sensitive skin. I have tried a lot of liquid detergents but this company’s products are the best! We have been using them for about 2 years now and no more reactions, I can even use the scented ones like the peppermint scent. Also love the company’s story and I love supporting a mission like that. Really great detergents and actually inexpensive! Coming from a house of four with constant messes lol.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Thygesen

customer_reviews.title: Better than traditional detergents, and better for the planet!
customer_reviews.text: I find it's easier to use than the liquid since you don't run the risk of it spilling everywhere when pouring. It has a nice minty scent, but the clothes come out simply "clean," not smelling like any fragrance. This is a big deal for my asthmatic husband. My clothes get just as clean, but I find this product is much more of a pleasure to use than your typical chemical laden (and environment destroying) liquid laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: IrishHarps

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the bee’s knees!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried soooo many natural laundry detergents and always been so disappointed when my clothes smell like stank and feel dirty after being washed with them. This detergent is the answer to my clean laundry prayers!!!! Not only does it take just one tablespoon of powder to get the clothes clean, but they come out smelling fresh! I highly recommend this product and am so grateful that my search for a good detergent has ended with Molly’s Suds.
customer_reviews.author: A. N. K.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return it
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is awful. Smells minty in the bag, yet leaves clothes still smelling dirty. Wish I could return it. Read the directions carefully, it says to wash everything is warm to hot water or it will leave a white residue. DO NOT USE IF YOU HAVE HIGH IRON/metals in your water. It will turn whites orange. This stuff is a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such an awesome chemical free option!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really enjoy this detergent. I was weary because we’ve always used Dreft due to us all having sensitive skin and 2 kids under 3 but we discovered how unhealthy it actually is recently and looked for something chemical free. The peppermint scent is pretty light so I don’t normally smell it once the clothes come out of the dryer but they still smell clean. I use a bit more than the recommended amount for a better clean. I recommend this for sure! It’s a good feeling removing unnecessary chemicals where you can. If you’re looking for something scented I use the wool dryer balls and do a couple drops of essential oil!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great for scent sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of allergies. I used to make my own soap powder, but I love this product. It is simple, basic, and it doesn't irritate my skin or my sinuses. It has a very light peppermint scent (you cannot smell it on clothes at all) that just adds a bit of freshness. Since I was adding a few drops of peppermint essential oil to my homemade soap, this was just fine with me. No scent in the house while the clothes are washing. Everything comes out fresh and clean. I also use the oxygen bleach powder. Great products.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I’ve always used Tide. Molly’s Suds is just as good and costs less. My clothes have never been so soft. I don’t even use fabric softener and they’ve never felt softer. It’s perfect for my two little girls too. I can’t stand strong artificial fragrances, so if you’re like me it won’t be a problem but even the scented one is almost fragrance free once out of the dryer. I may try out essential oils on wool balls to get a little extra scent but my laundry smells nice & clean anyways. Try it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not baby spit up approved
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be great, but it wasn’t. I bought this to use as detergent for my baby since it was highly rated and the ingredients were ranked safer than traditional detergent based on EWG. Unfortunately this stuff was not up for the task of handling baby spit up. I even tried using 2 scoops to see if that would help but unfortunately things just didn’t get clean enough. Switched back to trusty Tide free and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for clean product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as I am on a mission to use cleaner, less toxic products. Learned about it through a Facebook group. Peppermint scent is light; doesn’t transfer to clothing (which is fine). Seems to clean clothes well despite only requiring a small amount of detergent. Purchased the 120 load bag which is a great price per load. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany K.

customer_reviews.title: Helped clear my son's eczema
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing. In combination with no gluten, my 7 month old son's entire body is eczema free! I know the soap is partially to thank because when he rubbed body parts against any clothing or bedding that hadn't been washed with it yet, that part of his skin would flare up. Use warm water like the instructions say to maximize the benefits of this soap. Also- always do an extra rinse cycle with baby clothes. I highly recommend giving this soap a try if you are struggling to clear up baby eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Joy A

customer_reviews.title: Long term fail
customer_reviews.text: I liked this detergent when I first tried in July but after a while I noticed our clothes looked dingy after just being washed then I looked at the ingredients and there’s no soap in it just laundry boosters. Switched and now our clothes look clean! I now use the rest of the detergent to clean our toilets along with cleaner since it’s basically just baking soda and salt.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry detergent ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Was reluctant to buy not only a laundry powder, but a “natural” one. In the past, I didn’t feel powdered detergent cleaned clothes as well as liquid or pods. This proved me wrong. Bought it after an appliance service tech strongly recommended switching to powder to prolong life of washer. Love, love, love only having to use 1 tablespoon of powder. This bag has lasted me three months and we have a family of 5. Clothes come out very clean and this is safe to use on my sensitive skinned 2 year olds clothes with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: About 6 months ago, I noticed that all my ...
customer_reviews.text: About 6 months ago, I noticed that all my towels smelled musty no matter what I did when I washed them. I switched from all those high priced detergents and fabric softeners to Molly's Suds. I use their detergent, brightener (on whites and towels), and wool dryer balls. I use plain white vinegar as my fabric softener now. Nothing else. My clothes are cleaner, I save a ton of money, and most importantly, no more musty towels. I would give 5 stars but I wish they would package their product in something biodegradable instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Works Way Better Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I try to avoid nasty chemicals as much as possible, but the category that's been the toughest to "clean" up is laundry. This stuff actually gets clothes clean. The natural peppermint scent is nice, though clothes have no scent after taking them out of the wash. That means they don't smell bad--yay! I do wish they kept some of the peppermint scent, but I'm just glad they don't smell dirty. And my family's super sensitive skin is happy! I also like the oxygen whitener.
customer_reviews.author: Nattienatural

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Clean Laundry Company!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to think of this powder. I have been slowly transitioning over to clean products and haven't had much luck (looking at you clean deodorant) but I had heard rave things about Molly's Suds from Ashley Spivey (an influencer) and decided to give it a try. I have to say this is now my second bag and I could not be more pleased. I was worried moving from liquid to powder that it would leave a residue (it doesn't) the scent is a light peppermint scent and honestly smells spa like. My families clothes come out perfect I am now a convert.
customer_reviews.author: S. D'Orsi

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Molly's Suds soaps for a while because we have allergies and this soap seems to work better for us. I was using the unscented version and was not really happy with the smell of the clothes after being washed. And then I realized there was a peppermint version. The clothes smell good (no peppermint smell, just clean smell). Still great for sensitive skin. It is also washing machine friendly. Other soaps leave some sticky residue. Have no issues with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Puffers

customer_reviews.title: FRESH + CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: I've tried more than 5 other kinds of safe, natural laundry detergents and Molly's is the clear winner for our home. We are active and I only do laundry once a week. Molly's is effective in getting rid of the stink from our laundry, as well as getting out stains. When we have an extra dirty load, I wash it on the "Heavy Duty" cycle with 1 1/2 scoops of Molly's. After switching to Molly's, I ran out of detergent and bought the best product I could find at our local supermarket. We noticed a difference in the freshness of our laundry right away. We love Molly's and won't be going back. I haven't found any other product that compares!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Served my purposes
customer_reviews.text: This product has great promise, but is missing the "Suds" part. It served my purposes nicely though. I like the simple ingredients and added 3 bars of grated castile soap for the suds. Without the soap, clothes were still coming out smelly after the wash. It is now great for every day wear (jeans, tshirts, sheets, etc). Given it's abrasive quality, wouldn't use for delicate items.
customer_reviews.author: healthyway

customer_reviews.title: I love Molly's Suds!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Molly's Suds. I love the scent. It's so fresh, and mild. the clothes come out so soft and clean. I have very sensitive skin, and it doesn't Bother me. The powder is much better for my machine too. I think this is an excellent product for the environment too. I like that it has the bunny seal. Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine W.

customer_reviews.title: Just a small scoop for an entire load!
customer_reviews.text: A very little scoop - goes a long way! I love that I don't have to use a "cup" full for a load.. We farm, so I have dirty dirty clothes - heavy duty clothing and coats, etc to wash weekly. I thought I'd have to use more then recommended teaspoon, so I used 2-3 at first.. but found this is strong enough to wash a full load using only the small scoop it comes with, which I believe is about a teaspoon. There are no suds, just a good clean wash. I also use vinegar/water for fabric softener - so there are no odors or smells, - just a good clean washed scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: I love Molly Suds
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Molly Suds laundry detergent and Oxygen Whitener since around 2012. I have tried others but came back to Molly's. I also use the all sport laundry wash for stains. I am a very satisfied customer. This is a good product.. you know how some companies do the new and improved versions and they are actually worse.. please keep the good product good.
customer_reviews.author: hgwpen

customer_reviews.title: Best Detergent - Clean, Clean Clothes
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised and how well this detergent cleaned my clothes. I wasn't expecting much considering how little you have to use to clean a full load of clothes. Honestly, my clothes have never been cleaner. I use the recommend amount then I toss in about one-two tablespoons of Natures Miracle and a few drops of essential oil and my clothes are clean. This will be my go to detergent from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly044

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I purchased Molly’s because by front load washer was moldy and I was told to switch to powder. I wanted something natural and Molly’s was the first to pop up on the amazon search! After opening the bag and smelling the peppermint I was looking forward to the smell on my clothes but it did not carry over. It’s fine really. I have had to use 2 scoops instead of one on most of my loads. As of now I like it and plan on using the entire bag, with the intention of repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin and uniquely minty
customer_reviews.text: I live in a big city and still have problems finding sensitive skin products. I have to wash my laundry separate from the family, and decided to try this product on a whim. It smells great, lasts longer than liquid detergent, and per pound costs less than other powder soaps. I like their commitment to quality and fairness. Washing has been less stressful with these suds!
customer_reviews.author: Kazuki Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for stinky socks
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of the peppermint in this laundry soap. It did not clean my husband's socks. So I have to give it a 3/5. I love what the company stands for and their ingredients, but it did not “clean.” I have been using natural detergents for years.
customer_reviews.author: Nurseandmommy

customer_reviews.title: I actually look forward to laundry day now
customer_reviews.text: I have had a weird obsession with doing laundry ever since getting this. I think my whites are the whitest they've ever been, and the peppermint smell is great. I use a half scoop of Molly's and a half scoop of OxiClean, which seems to so the trick for super white whites. I had been using 7th Generation and OxiClean before, but I always had to dissolve the detergent powder to make sure it didn't leave a residue, and though it generally did a good job, sometimes I would have to rrwash items. Now there's no hassle and everything comes out really clean.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Average detergent
customer_reviews.text: I find that this detergent is simply average. I had high hopes for it and although I trust the brand and its claims as earth friendly, the stain fighting power simply isn't there. I still have to add a laundry Booster or do an extra stain treatment for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Bray

customer_reviews.title: Cloth Diaper Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after finding out Dreft has harsh chemicals in it even though it is advertised as a baby safe product. So I sat for days trying to find an actual natural and safe laundry detergent for my family and ended up trying this one since it passed my ingredient check list. I’m cloth diapering my son and I wash his diapers by hand. It does a great job of getting everything clean! This will definitely be one of my go-to laundry detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells fresh, feels softer, and clothes look brighter!
customer_reviews.text: Molly's Suds original scent has a wonderfully light peppermint smell. I washed all of my laundry for the week just as recommended. My clothes smell fresh, they seem to be brighter, as well as softer. Very happy with my purchase. I've washed 3 loads using 1 & 1/2 scoops per load due to my large machine. All that's left, is to count how many loads I get!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: The only thing we use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent! We are a family of 6 and we go through a lot of laundry. We have a front loader HE washer that despite following all the guidelines was always getting that film around the seal and smelling. I had switched to Molly’s Suds because I was looking for a more economical natural detergent. I noticed right away that the clothes were clean and fresh but then there was the added benefit that with this powder detergent the smell and grime in my washer went away!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great natural clean!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to cut the chemicals out , although I initially thought this was unscented and ordered the peppermint in error , turns out to be a great soap and if your laundry is especially grubby just add a little vinegar to your rinse cycle . It is really a great soap . Will purchase again .
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Bommer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Products
customer_reviews.text: I think this stuff is great, the close feel cleaner and look better. I'm sold! I especially love the Oxygen Whitener. I have a teal color bath towel that has stains of blood from trimming the dogs nails. It's been washed and dried many times and the stains were set for life I thought......Just thought I'd give the Oxygen Whitener a try and I couldn't believe my eyes, all the blood stains were gone and it looked like a new towel. These products are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Kinder

customer_reviews.title: Decreasing Toxins & staying clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love Molly’s Suds- taking another set of Toxins out of our regime is a great feeling and when that replacement works well- it’s even better!! Please look at your ingredients on your products- remember that “fragrance” can be a cover up for ANY ingredient- and the company NEVER has to disclose what they are under current laws... be safe, keep your family safe and our water/world safe 💚
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Purdue Rep

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us at all!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has sensitive skin, so I was on the look out for an all natural detergent. Unfortunately, this detergent didn't get our clothes smelling fresh or clean. Even items that were fairly clean going in to the wash came out smelling musty. I just didn't like it at all. It was like I didn't use any soap or detergent and just ran a water-wash.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Detergent We've Used!
customer_reviews.text: Molly's Suds does not disappoint! The fresh scent of peppermint is incredible. I accidentally left the bag open in my laundry room and two hours later, half of my house smelled like peppermint. Three out of four people in my house have eczema and Molly's Suds doesn't irritate their skin at all. I've actually noticed fewer flare-ups since we started using the products. My husband works on cars all day so his clothes are covered in oil, grease, and diesel. Two scoops of the detergent and the horrid smell of mechanic work is gone! The oxygen whitener is amazing too! And one last thing, one bag of detergent lasts so long...the price is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: P Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent and eco friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering this for the last 6 months or so and love it! It has a nice peppermint smell but not overpowering. I don’t like clothes that have a heavy perfume smell after they come out of the washer so this is perfect. The price is reasonable and I like how it eliminates the extra plastic from the bottles of detergent I used to buy at the store. I was looking for a laundry detergent more eco friendly and less packaging, and that works better than the homemade stuff I was making. Molly’s lasts for about 3 months which is great and you only use a tablespoon of this. I think it’sa great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Watson-Sooy

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A non toxic laundry powder that actually WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Finally, a laundry powder that is non toxic AND actually works! I have tried other safe laundry soap but none have cleaned our clothes very well. It defeats the purpose of using non toxic powder when you have to rewash in something harsh and/or use Resolve. I have a little one so the less chemicals the better for him. Molly's only requires the use of a tablespoon (included)! Make sure you follow the directions and put it directly in the laundry and not through the dispenser. So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Dosen’t dissolve well leaves white streaks on dark clothes
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t dissolve well in my HE washer I put it in first then add the water and then the clothes and my dark clothes come out with bunch of white streaks and when dry also white grains of what looks like salt all over them. My machine is brand new so no buildup in it! Help!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner Laundry or Health Concerns -- This is For You!
customer_reviews.text: We use Molly's Suds because we have a cancer survivor in the family and we have eliminated all chemicals from our lives. And (unlike some non-chemical stuff), Molly's really works. Our laundry is as clean as it ever was -- or cleaner. The bag is compact, we're saving space. The smell is pleasant, but not a big deal. And, no chemicals. BUY THIS. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Power that's Safe for People & the Environment!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cleaning power, nice light scent, goes a long way! After a year of using Molly's Suds, I am completely satisfied! I purchased a double pack, which lasted about a year for my husband and I. The detergent is economical, cleans well, and is environmentally conscious. I tell everyone I know about how good this product is. I'll never go back to the big brand laundry soaps with excess packaging and potentially harmful chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kraeger

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It gets the clothes clean and doesn’t leave nasty stuff behind. You do need to use more than they recommend, but I think that’s because I have a very large washer. I use vinegar and lemon essential oil for the fabric softener.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ramseyer

customer_reviews.title: I have used this twice & seal on bag has broken..
customer_reviews.text: I bought for washing cloth diapers, laundry soaps with brighteners/built in fabric softeners are monstrously negative for absorbency. Our son was wetting out after ecos changed their formula to add brighteners and fabric softeners.. hate that. I have used this twice & seal on bag has broken. Glad that didn't happen during shipping as there wasn't anything to protect in shipping box. I like the smell of this, mildly minty. Didn't notice any lingering scent on cloth diapers, but only time will tell if it works for the heavily soiled ones..
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but price is high
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My only complaint is the price. I do not feel that one scoop is enough so I have to use two to clean my laundry. In the end it really equates to the same amount of product as conventional. I think the price is really just too steep. I'm in college and I can't use conventional detergents so I cringe at how much this costs. I hope in the future they can lower their prices. Those who are well off have more freedom to avoid toxins, where as lower income people can't afford a 20$ detergent. Everyone deserves safe affordable alternatives!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: THE TIDE IS OUT AND WON'T BE COMING BACK
customer_reviews.text: In love! Smells wonderful when you open the bag and while it is technically not suppose to scent clothes, it leaves them smelling fresh! I haven't determined exact amount to use with varying sized loads, I've just been using the whole scoop no matter size of load. I'm so happy I tried this laundry soap. I used Norwex for two years and had issues - from the odd odor opening the bag to not dissolving even diluting before putting in washer. It left oil-like stains on my blouses. So you don't have to go to one of those home parties, just buy Molly's Suds on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing detergent works better then bleach!
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe how well this ALL NATURAL laundry detergent cleaned. I used one scoop right in the wash with heavily soiled white baby clothes and other items. I did not pretreat just washed on a perm press wash and everything came out looking brand new. It really is amazing how well this detergent cleaned!! The whites were also very bright! It's also cheaper then other known brands like tide and dreft and without all the chemicals. This product great all around, price and quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry detergent. It's a peppermint smell and it smells so amazing! It's great for sensitive skin for myself and my infants clothes. I feel better knowing im using something that's eco friendly. The bag is huge as well and you feel like you got a good product for the money because it only takes a little scoop for the clothes, and the scoop is included. I think I have found a perfect detergent for all of my laundry!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic detergent!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I discovered this detergent! It smells lovely going in the washer, but the smell doesn’t transfer to the clean clothes, which I prefer. Maybe the peppermint helps get out nasty odors? And you only have to use a tiny amount, so the bag lasts for a LONG time. And it doesn’t give my husband a rash like some other detergents. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: GinHum

customer_reviews.title: By FAR one of the best products I've used in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great wash for all of your laundry needs! I keep coming back for more and more, and even signed up on Molly's Suds actual website! The story behind the brand isn't a fun one, but it's meaningful and I love their products! couldn't recommend them anymore than I already do!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Gegg

customer_reviews.title: Clean ingredients, clothes smell fresh!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found a laundry detergent that is safe for my whole family. My 7 month old has really bad eczema and sensitive skin so I am very cautious about the products that come in contact with his skin. This detergent is gentle, it smells good, our clothes smell fresh, and it’s free of all the toxic chemicals that most other laundry detergents are packed full of. We also use the Molly Suds wool dryer balls because most dryer sheets are full of chemicals too. Molly Suds gives me comfort knowing my family’s clothes are clean and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney S.

customer_reviews.title: WHITES MUCH IMPROVED NO SOFTENER NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: REPLACED MY LIQUID DETERGENT {starts wit a T}that I have used for years along with liquid fabric softener whites like dress shirts that had a yellow tinge around collar area are now white and using the dryer balls and no fabric softener clothing is as soft as before I was skeptical using such a small amount but much to my surprise clothing is so clean and odor free the product is amazing I am a fan!
customer_reviews.author: craig borst

customer_reviews.title: support USA business
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my cousin. I use it to wash my babies clothes. And i started using the extra strength molly suds on my husband's clothes and mine. What i like most about this product is that it is made in the USA, so i don't have to worry about what's getting on my family's clothes. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Stay away if breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: The strong peppermint scent was an issue for me, as it helped to decrease my lactation. Peppermint decreases lactation. In addition, this was not useful for cleaning baby poop from various cotton items. I DO NOT recommend this laundry powder.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin, strong enough for family of 5
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my newborn and family of 5 with sensitive skin It actually took out some heavy stains that other soaps weren't taking out as well. Washed breastmilk poop stained baby items fairly well also. Great smell. Powder can be airborne eaisly and inhailed if you scoop too quickly or aggressively. Otherwise great product. We will quit buying charlies soap and all others weve tried and stick with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tejanamama

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love Molly's. It is free of artificial fragrance (a light natural peppermint oil makes clothes smell clean and fresh) and there is no residue left. My family is sensitive to fragrance and commercial laundry detergents/soaps are not well tolerated causing severe allergies. Molly's does the job with no problem and a little goes a long way making it very economical.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda J

customer_reviews.title: actually cleans, natural scent
customer_reviews.text: this is one of those products that you'd recommend to every one of your friends and family. Anything with artificial fragrance gives me a lot of itching and headaches, so this detergent is the perfect solution to that. My clothes come out smelling like .... nothing, basically extremely clean and no leftover residue and fragrances
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Duran

customer_reviews.title: Waste of and money!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so confused by this item!! The reviews are amazing and yet my experience has been awful! It’s as if I didn’t put detergent in the washer!! Clothes come out the same as I put them in!!!! Complete, complete waste of money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Inabella

customer_reviews.title: BUY CONSCIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to clean well. Great product. No u dissolved detergent. No oils spots like most nontoxic plant based cleaners. My clothes are NOT heavily soiled regularly though. I find myself using two scoops instead of one. One did not seem to clean well enough. Even using 2 scoops will last you a while!
customer_reviews.author: WitchyWoo

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind getting clean laundry without chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I wanted safe laundry detergent for my granddaughters clothing. I use it for our clothing as well. I’ve used other natural brands but this product leaves the laundry fresher smelling after washing. I purchased the peppermint scent. The clothes don’t smell like peppermint after washing. Just fresh!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Remove Stains
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for the clean ingredients and nice, barely there smell. My clothes come out looking/feeling clean but it doesn’t take out even the tiniest of stains! I use according to directions, wash on largest load, and even add vinegar and stain remover if needed. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Molly's Suds now has a customer for life!
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent because it's made from natural ingredients and it works! I like the feeling that my family and I are not soaking up chemicals left behind from detergent (and/or fabric softeners), Initially, the powder smells strongly of peppermint, but the clothes do not smell like peppermint after they are washed and dried, they just smell CLEAN! I like that a little goes a long way! I like that Im only buying soap ingredients, not the added water which is used to make up liquid detergents. I do recommend using wool dryer balls, because without them the clothes/sheets came out feeling stiffer than I like. I am a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin itchy
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 scoops of this and noticed everything my skin touched that I washed with this product made itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: I like knowing I'm using something that is natural while doing what it's supposed to do. Also, I like to support small companies that are trying to do the right thing. I do enjoy the peppermint scent although it doesn't stay on your laundry. I would enjoy some new scents to choose from for variety.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Ohlrogge

customer_reviews.title: Left our clothes unclean....
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that this left my clothes looking and smelling unclean. What a bummer! I love natural products, but not if they don’t work!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to a natural laundry soap that works, this is it. I have been slowly removing toxic cleaners from my house. I read many blogs/reviews about Molly's Suds so I wanted to give it a try. My laundry comes out smelling fresh and clean...not the heavy fragrances of typical laundry detergent. I have been very pleased with how clean our clothes have been. Definitely will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: anniep

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: I was super hesitant to buy this after using other natural detergents. The key I think is to go with powder and not liquid. I can’t say this gets super stains out but does the job. Clothes aren’t super soft but no strong detergent smell. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent! I start the washer, put the powder in to dissolve, add clothes, and each load has turned out great. No powder residue and clothes come out soft and clean. The powder is a pleasant minty smell, but the clothes usually come out with a neutral clean scent. Sometimes I will add a drop or two of essential oil when I add the powder to make the laundry more scented. I use this for the whole family and so far we’ve had zero issues. One bag will last a long time, too!
customer_reviews.author: bethany

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this detergent
customer_reviews.text: We've been trying to use more natural products in our home and came across this powdered detergent. Once washed, clothes don't have any scent. None: good or bad. At first it seemed a little strange after years of using commercial, scented detergent, but now I can't believe we'd grown so accustomed to the artificial scent. Our items that are prone to lingering smells (workout gear mostly), now is free of any sweaty scent! No issues with staining or trouble getting visibly clean either. We are hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Caused Full Body Itching
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this detergent for my daughter with eczema. It ended up making her whole body itch. Once I realized it was the detergent, I rewashed everything in our old detergent and the itch went away. I believe it might have been caused by the peppermint. Just wanted to leave this review in case it happens to anyone with sensitive skin or eczema
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: I like that's it's natural and good for our environment. Very very light scent. Never had a problem with it bothering our skin.. Last a long time and you juts need a tiny bit of product for a load. Cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: BPLopez

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company.
customer_reviews.text: My wife fell in love with this product after using their cloth diaper formula. That stuff worked amazingly well and was a fantastic price. This seems to fit the same bill, though the peppermint scent was a bit surprising. It works great, the concentration is fantastic, and we love to keep Molly's thoughts with us in the product story. We won't buy other laundry detergents now.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: Have used it for years and absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite laundry product by far-- I've tried just about every natural option out there. A bag lasts my family of 3 well over 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for stains.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this. The smell is good and it gets smells out pretty well. However I just doesn’t work on my toddlers stains! I even tried washing the clothes 2 or 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this detergent and allergic to anything with coconut
customer_reviews.text: Please don't ever change what you put in your products! I am in love with this detergent and allergic to anything with coconut. It's septic safe, all natural, and environmental friendly that packs a big punch. I did discover for best results at least use warm water it doesn't dissolve as good in cold. Future buyer again and again
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: works for us (sensitive/eczema skin)
customer_reviews.text: after trying all different kinds of detergents we finally found one that doesn't cause us to itch/flair up. no guarantees it'll work for you but we're happy with it. also the powder has a light peppermint scent (not noticeable after washing/drying though)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clumps into solid Mass
customer_reviews.text: I have a HE washer. It is a front loader. Attempted to use in detergent dispenser and instead of working as powder detergent it clumped up into a hard mass it never entered the main part of the washer. I have not yet put in the drum with those clothes at the same time we'll try that next so far very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great soap to wash your clothes!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Molly's brand for 2 years now. I try to use natural, synthetic free products. This does a great job at removing stains, has a nice minty scent and is easy to use. The acent does not last long on clothes, but thats fine with me. Someyimes I use bleach with whites if they need it, but it keeps most of my clothes bright!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever laundry soap. Very gentle on gentle skin
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely live this laundry detergent. Not all those chemicals that irritate my skin. I can sure tell the difference. Last a long time too. You use one tablespoon for a load.will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Long

customer_reviews.title: The problem is the plastic bag the products comes in
customer_reviews.text: These kind of bags leak and don't close easily. Seems everything I buy with this kind of bag arrives leaking. Anyway, the detergent is fine, the bag it comes in sucks.
customer_reviews.author: oldmikey23

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST toxin free Detergent out there! In fact it's better than every Detergent I've ever used. We all have sensitive skin and this is the first time none of us have had a reaction to a Detergent. The smell is invigorating and our clothes, sheets, towels, etc., are fresh and clean. I've recommended this product to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: ...but it just doesn’t get my clothes clean, even when I pretreat toddler stains the shirts still come out dirty. Would be ok for very lightly dirty clothes, but nothing stained, stinky, or messy, even with pretreat.
customer_reviews.author: Bradshaw&Palmer

customer_reviews.title: using for 2 years now
customer_reviews.text: no complaints, only use a small amount so each bag lasts a long time. i use it to get away from heavy scents of regular washing powders. thanks for a good product
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: I am super happy that I did and look forward to laundry ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at using this product for a while now and finally broke down to try it. I am super happy that I did and look forward to laundry days. Our clothes smell better, feel better , and the static has stopped. I also use the whitener and it's perfect too. Use wool balls for your dryer- you'll be amazed. I read a lot of users comments and also the web pages FAQS and it was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Arik

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: pros: light peppermint scent and appears to have decent cleaning power. cons: the powder gives off what i can only describe as a fog cloud when adding it to the washing machine. really very strange. conclusion:going back to nellies when this bag is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has very sensitive skin and it's been difficult trying to find a laundry detergent that works for her but that smells good. Molly's Suds Original is wonderful!! Works great for her and smells good too!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A Keltgen

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great, a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Cleans great. Not much is needed for even the largest loads, so this bag lasts a really long time. I believe the last bag lasted 9 months for a family of 4. Environmentally friendly, no nasty toxic smells. It is a 'for sure' buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Timken

customer_reviews.title: Great non toxic detergent!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd round of Molly’s and I love it as a natural detergent. I do feel that some of the chemical laden detergents may get the stains out more effortlessly. However, I would much rather pre treat and wash in a non toxic detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for allergies
customer_reviews.text: Great for those with multiple allergies and sensitivities! On my third bag, and no plans to switch brands. So glad someone recommended this stuff to me, I was tearing my hair out trying to find something I could even use with all my allergies, and this product definitely fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn C

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for a month now and am pleased with how clean my clothes smell. I’ve always been a bit skeptical of soap that doesn’t suds up, but that doesn’t seem to make a difference here. I do add vinegar to soften our water a bit. Happy to have found a natural product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does a very good job. I have a HE washer and what ...
customer_reviews.text: It does a very good job. I have a HE washer and what works best with this laundry soap is to put the powder directly in the machine before I put the clothes in, as well as to fill both the detergent and the softener compartments with white vinegar. I love the ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: PRB

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love Molly's Suds. My clothes come out very clean and they smell fresh. It is very easy to use in my front loader and septic tank friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Molly's Suds Original Laundry Detergent Powder 120 load, Natural Laundry Soap for Sensitive Skin
feature_bullets: SUPER CONCENTRATED, NATURAL AND EFFECTIVE Laundry Powder was developed to be eco-friendly and people-safe. Designed for those who are chemically sensitive, have sensitive skin, allergies, or eczema. Safe for all fabric types except silk and leather - including synthetic, blends, and natural fibers with no risk of fading.

PRETREAT STAINS before washing, our concentrated powder packs a powerful cleaning punch. Wet the area from the inside out with cool water, make a paste of the Laundry Powder and apply over the stain, gently brushing into the garment, allow to set before rinsing and launder as usual.

PERFECT FOR HIGH-EFFICIENCY WASHING MACHINES, our formula gently and effectively cleans even the dirtiest garments while producing minimal suds, so it doesn't block and damage HE machine sensors. Our Laundry Powder contains no chemical-based sudsing ingredients, which means you get a natural, effective, and low-suds clean.

FORMULATED WITH ONLY FIVE EARTH-DERIVED INGREDIENTS, our Original Laundry Powder is created using pure, quality ingredients that are safe for people and the planet. It is safe for those with skin sensitivities, allergies, eczema, fragrance sensitivities, and newborn baby clothing and bedding. This product is Certified Cruelty Free, Certified Vegan, Made in the USA, and Rated "A" in EWG's Guide to Healthy Cleaning.

WHAT'S INCLUDED: One 80.25 oz bag of Original Laundry Powder with one blue measuring scoop. Clean as a whistle, our original Laundry Powder does not contain any of the following toxic ingredients or byproducts: Synthetic Fragrances, Dyes, Optical Brighteners, Nonylphenol Ethoxylate, Petrochemicals, Phosphate, Fillers, Bleach, known carcinogens, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), or Sodium Laureth Sulfate (SLES), 1,4 Dioxane, or Formaldehyde.
